snippet.title: Batman Playthrough (SEGA GENESIS/MEGA DRIVE)
snippet.description:
While there was many Batman games based on the 1989 movie I would argue that this game is arguably the best of the bunch being contested by the NES game only. Great control, better balanced difficulty and a music soundtrack to die for. Plus you get to drive the Batmobile and Batplane which I feel was sorely missed from the NES game sadly. While I love this game and the NES game equally, finding this game nowadays on actual cartridge is a feat since it seems to be rather rare. Either way whether you play it on the cartride (like I did for this video) or on emulator this game is well worth the time and effort to play. A true classic! 


Hope you enjoy!
